pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Calm & De-Stress Powder 90g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Calm + De-stress Powder is a premium quality formula containing magnesium, ashwagandha, passionflower and reishi mushroom.

Mild Anxiety Symptom Relief: Passionflower is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help relieve symptoms of mild anxiety and as a calmative to relax the nervous system.

Healthy Stress Response: Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine as an adaptogen to help the body adapt to stress. Magnesium supports a healthy stress response in the body.

Nervous System Health: Magnesium maintains nervous system health.

Fatigue Relief: Reishi mushroom is traditionally used in Chinese medicine to help relieve fatigue.

No Added Artificial Sweetener: Naturally sweetened with monk fruit and stevia.

Size: 90g

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

EACH SCOOP (3 g) CONTAINS: Magnesium (from magnesium citrate nonahydrate) 105mg, Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera extract 60 mg) equiv. dry root [standardised to contain withanolides (of withania somnifera) 3 mg] 3 g (min.), Passionflower (Passiflora incarnata extract 120 mg) equiv. dry herb 6g, Reishi Mushroom (Ganoderma lucidum extract 100 mg) equiv. dry fruiting body 2g.

Directions

Adult Dosage: Using the enclosed scoop, mix one level scoop (3 g) with 200 mL of water. Consume once daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
